title: Happy Birthday Kalam Sir! On His Birthday, People Pay Tribute To Him By Planting Trees
text:
Happy Birthday Kalam Sir! On His Birthday, People Pay Tribute To Him By Planting Trees

Happy Birthday Kalam Sir! On His Birthday, People Pay Tribute To Him By Planting Trees

An aerospace scientist, the 11th President of India and one of the scientists involved in the Pokhran tests, he has been - and continues to be - an inspiration to the young and old alike. Yes, we are talking about Dr APJ Abdul Kalam!

He has given the nation a lot of reasons to be proud of him and the entire nation indeed is! Known as the Missile Man of India, he was responsible for the development and implementation of Agni and Prithvi missiles, which made him popular as the 'Missile Man of India'.

To honour him, the United Nations has declared October 15 as ‘World’s Student’s Day’. He was loved by the entire nation and on his 88th birthday, people paid tribute to the greatest scientists of all times, by planting trees in his memory.

#PlantForKalam was trending on Twitter; Tamilian actor, Vivekh started the trend today to inspire people to go green.

அன்பு மாணவர்களே! இளையோரே! அவர் விட்டுச் சென்ற பணியை நாம் தொடர்வோம். Happy bday to Kalam sir pic.twitter.com/8pW2Qdi5BA — Vivekh actor (@Actor_Vivek) October 15, 2019

Lots of People shared pictures on Twitter by writing #PlantForKalam.

1.

Don't Miss 6.3 K SHARES 10.9 K SHARES 11.4 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES 1.5 K SHARES

2.

If you want free of Oxygen in future...! ,

you Should plant a tree with nature..!

#plantforkalam pic.twitter.com/xglMbZNNiP — Naveenkumar K (@Naveenk02202887) October 15, 2019

3.

We have been planting trees and taking care of them for around 15 yrs & will even continue to do so in the future.

On this special day, APJ Abdul Kalam Sir's birthday, I request everyone to plant at least one tree in your homes.

🙏

Let's all make it happen ! #plantforkalam pic.twitter.com/5W9RGPtwKM — Vaidyanathan (@vaidywitty) October 15, 2019

4.

#APJAbdulKalam Remembering one of the most Inspirational Leader of our generation....Happy 88th Birth Anniversary Kalam Sir 💐💐💐#plantforkalam pic.twitter.com/6DLwKMqO5r — இரா. திலீபன் (@Dileepan_1991) October 15, 2019

5.

6.

HBD to the legend A.P.J.Abdul Kalaam sir

A true inspiration for millions 🇮🇳#plantforkalam 🌱#HBDAbdulKalam 🌾🇮🇳 pic.twitter.com/FqE6pgSNjf — ♂️ ᴿᵃᵗᵉᵈ ®️ ˢᵘᵖᵉʳ ˢᵗᵃʳ ᵀʰᵃˡᵃᵖᵃᵗʰʸ 🌟Bɪɢɪʟ ⚓ (@Stunner2win1) October 15, 2019

#plantforkalam Today is our favorite Kalam Sir's birthday! The best gift we could give him on this birthday! Come on everybody .... 🙏🤗 pic.twitter.com/VnwXFTKrrS — Nitish Kumar (@Nitishkr1997) October 14, 2019

Our team is ready to plant a samplings tomorrow.....#plantforkalam pic.twitter.com/byBEMLieyy — Vinothkumar ds (@dsvinothkumar) October 14, 2019

Now, this, is how you remember a legend!

Picture Credits: Twitter
description: An aerospace scientist, the 11th President of India and one of the scientists involved in the Pokhran tests, he has been - and continues to be - an inspiration to the young and old alike. Yes, we are talking about Dr APJ Abdul Kalam! He has given the nation lots of reasons to be proud of him and we seriously are!
